title: **Diary Cat Command List**
description:
Welcome to Diary Cat!
 You can get start by using `dl!add [you diary entry]` and then `dl!read` to read your diary.

**You can now direct message the bot with these commands for privacy**

Use `dl!help [command]` to learn more about a specific command.You need further support? Join our [support server](https://discord.gg/shuJ8A3Ced)

fields.name: ğŸ“ **Add diary entry**
fields.value:
`dl!add [a note] [attach a picture]` : add an entry to your diary!
`dl!addText [a note]` : add an entry with no picture.

fields.name: ğŸ“– **Read your diary**
fields.value:
`dl!read` : see all of your diary entries!
`dl!delete` : show instruction to delete an entry.

fields.name: âš™ï¸ **Setting and misc**
fields.value:
`dl!feedback` : send an anonymous feedback to the owner.
`dl!remindOn` - `dl!remindOff` : turn on or off the reminder, default is on.
`dl!invite` : get the link to invite this bot to different server.
`dl!help [name of the command]` : get specific help about that command.
`dl!viewAnnouncement` : see the newest announcement.
